entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • It would be useful to have option for not generating TargetPlatformAttribute / SupportedOSPlatformAttribute #14836
    Backlog

Updated

  • Scripts breaking after upgrade to .NET 7 due to missing classes from System.Security.Cryptography #29325

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add escape switch for TargetPlatform and SupportedOS attributes #29698
    Area-NetSDK

Updated

  • extend typo correction functionality with StartsWith and Contains #29350
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • [DO NOT MERGE] [release/7.0.1xx] Inverted language version conditions in console / classlib templates to support new language features for newer language versions #29636
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
